response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from me at a price of $900,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to me and your perceived value, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction. I believe this offer provides a fair compromise that respects the worth you see in the product while allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its value. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms of this offer.", "product_price": 900000}
